Title: Great Victory at Pingxing Pass
Publisher: Shanghai jiaoyu chubanshe (上海教育出版社)
Notes: The Battle of Pingxingguan was fought between the communist Eighth Route Army and the Imperial Japanese Army in September 1937, early in the Second Sino-Japanese War.Poster based on an oil painting by Ren Mengzhang 任梦璋 and Yang Weiming 楊为銘.
